Name: Herald of the Depths
About the game: Herald of the Depths is a short action roguelike. Find your lost dog and explore forgotten depths filled with dangerous creatures. Permadeath runs into procedurally generated dungeons filled with monsters. Choose different paths and upgrades to increase your odds of finally rescuing your dog! features: - Simple Character Creation - Upgrade Items to become more powerful - Strange people with quests to complete - 6 forgotten areas to discover - 2 Pixel art cutscenes
